channel.title: CVE Feed for Elastic -- Elastic App Search
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elastic -- Elastic App Search

item.title: CVE-2021-22140|2024-08-03T18:30:23.960Z -- elastic -- elastic%20app%20search
item.description: Elastic App Search versions after 7.11.0 and before 7.12.0 contain an XML External Entity Injection issue (XXE) in the App Search web crawler beta feature. Using this vector, an attacker whose website is being crawled by App Search could craft a malicious sitemap.xml to traverse the filesystem of the host running the instance and obtain sensitive files.
